name: TrumpMe
0:
”Alexa, open Trump Me”
”Alexa, ask Trump Me what is going on”
”Alexa, ask Trump Me how is the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trump me
des:
Stay current on Trump's latest tweets. This is for the Washington news junkie, patriot, bad hombre or anyone that loves a good smile.

Just opening the skill will read out Trump's most current tweets or ask what is going on.

#MAGA
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
